OOC, Dewey wants to know how much longer his moderation is for. Has he been=
 forgotten?

BIC: Ice and Mustex aproached Maximal city. Ice
> called ahead=
 anouncing thier
> arrival. "Ice to Maximal city, I'm aproaching from
> the=
 North. Please hold
> your fire." The owl was impressed by the changes
> th=
at had been made since
> she'd last been there. There was very little left =
to
> remind her that the
> Cybertronian Fire had once sat where the city no=
w
> was. "You never did
> elaborate," Ice said to Mustex, "What is wrong wi=
th
> your son?" She wasn't
> sure how to put it lightly, she knew that it w=
as a
> touchy subject, but it
> was the only subject she could think to use=
 to start
> a conversation.

Mustex wasn't comfortable talking about things=
 but fealt it was necessary if Veratis' bots were going to assist him. "He =
was transformed into a baby Protohuman, His current form leaves him without=
 knowledge or any capacity to function adaquately." His concern was evident=
 to Ice, even as a robot his facial expressions changed with his tone. Ther=
e was no question about the emotions for Stallex.

Ice fealt the urge to mo=
ve closer, to give the other bot a reassureing nudge. Her feelings were to =
mixxed to describe. She wasn't sure who to feel sorry for, Mustex for going=
 through everything thats happened, or Stallex for being reformatted as an =
infant.
